com.google.appinventor.client.jsonp
Class JsonpConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.client.jsonp.JsonpConnection
Direct Known Subclasses:
CodeblocksConnection
public class JsonpConnection
extends Object

Class used for communicating with an HTTP server via JSONP requests.

Author:
lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)

Constructor Detail

JsonpConnection

public JsonpConnection(JsonpConnectionInfo connInfo,
                       JSONParser jsonParser,
                       com.google.common.base.Function<String,String> escapeQueryParameterFunction)
Creates a JsonpConnection object with the given connection information, JSON parser, and escape function.

Parameters:
connInfo - the JSONP connection information
jsonParser - the JSON parser
escapeQueryParameterFunction - the escape function
Method Detail

sendJsonpRequest

public <T> void sendJsonpRequest(String request,
                                 Map<String,Object> parameters,
                                 com.google.common.base.Function<String,? extends T> function,
                                 AsyncCallback<T> callback)
Sends a JSONP request by embedding a script tag into the document. Generates a new id for the request.

Parameters:
request - the request to be made
parameters - the parameters for the request
function - a function that transforms the response into the type that the callback needs
callback - the callback that should be called with the transformed response

getNextRequestId

public String getNextRequestId()
Returns the next request id;

sendJsonpRequestAndPoll

public <T> void sendJsonpRequestAndPoll(String request,
                                        Map<String,Object> p,
                                        com.google.common.base.Function<String,? extends T> function,
                                        AsyncCallback<T> callback)
Sends a JSONP request by embedding a SCRIPT tag into the document and then polls for the result by resending the request with the parameter JsonpConstants.POLLING. We continue polling until we receive a response that is not JsonpConstants.NOT_FINISHED_YET.

Parameters:
request - the request to be made
p - the parameters for the request
function - a function that transforms the response into the type that the callback needs
callback - the callback that should be called with the transformed response

makeURI

public String makeURI(String request,
                      Map<String,Object> parameters,
                      String id)
Returns the URI for a JSONP request.

Parameters:
request - the request to be made
parameters - the parameters for the request
id - the id for the request

defineBridgeMethod

public static void defineBridgeMethod()
Define the jsonpcb method that is called from javascript for all JSONP requests that we make.

jsonpcb

public static void jsonpcb(String id,
                           boolean success,
                           String response)
Called from the native jsonpcb method defined above, for all JSONP requests that we make.

Parameters:
id - the id of the script tag that made the JSONP request
success - whether the request was successful or not
response - the response produced by the JSONP request if successful, or the exception message if not successful

removeJsonpRequest

public void removeJsonpRequest(String id)
Removes the JSONP request with the given id.

quit

public void quit()
Sends a JSONP request to the HTTP server telling it to quit.

addConnectivityListener

public void addConnectivityListener(ConnectivityListener listener)
Registers the given @{link ConnectivityListener}.

removeConnectivityListener

public void removeConnectivityListener(ConnectivityListener listener)
Unregisters the given @{link ConnectivityListener}.
